name: Komax Systems
overview:
Since from 1973 Komax Systems offering a diverse range of Static Mixers, Steam Heaters, Desuperheater and Heat Exchanger.

Komax Systems Inc. is world leader in static mixer engineering .We have 32 mixing and heat transfer patents. Only Komax provides unique triple action static mixing functionality. Triple action provides highest level of mixing in any static mixer. All static mixers have very high mixing efficiency with short mixing length. Fiberglass static mixers are very useful in modern mills, water static mixers are very useful in additive mixing, Desuperheater is simple and sophisticated design concept. Please feel free to contact us for any query or information.

Services: • Mixing Wide Variety Of Food Products • Desalination Of Sea Water • Additive Mixing • Aggressive Chemical Mixing • Bleach Mixing For Modern Mills Products: • Inline Static Mixers • Static Bleach Mixers • Motionless Mixers • Chemical Mixers • Sludge Heat Exchanger • Desalination Static Mixers • Fiberglass Static Mixers
